verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
YOU ARE MY KING,
(You are my King)
And I love You.
You are my King, (You are my King)
And I worship You.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Kneeling before You now,
All of my life I gladly give to You.
Placing my hopes and dreams
In Your hands,
I give my heart to You.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
I love You, love You, Jesus.
Yes, I love You, love You, Jesus, My King.
